Welcome to my dumb blog where I post some shit, including stuff about DuckTales 2017, Sonic The Hedgehog, Aggretsuko, DuckTales, Pokemon, SpongeBob, Hamtaro, Kirby, and Doraemon.
I like to occasionally tell fun facts or obscure trivia about stuff I know about.
(BY THE WAY: Tsunoda, Bijou, Dorami, and Webby are all precious girls who should be protected.)
My Fanfiction.Net Account (that was formally named JunichiNobuyoDoraemonMan) is now called KnockKnockIt'sKnuckles.

summary: Komiya and Tsunoda have such an adorable relationship in this 8 second clip from Episode #98 of the original Aggressive Retsuko...
body:
Komiya and Tsunoda have such an adorable relationship in this 8 second clip from Episode #98 of the original Aggressive Retsuko shorts. It’s also sweet to see that Komiya isn’t a heartless bastard towards everybody in the offices.

(I hope we see more of their relationship in Season 2 of the Netflix series!)

tags: and things that sound like katakana
title: Aggretsuko Christmas Special
body:
Just a real quick post with some interesting words in the Aggretsuko Christmas Special, which I finally watched!

シズル感；しずるかん；sizzle (usu. in advertising); dazzle; (a) kicker

ノーパソ (abbreviation of ノートパソコン）；laptop

ふらっと；aimlessly; by chance; accidentally; casually; suddenly; unexpectedly

plus this translation of ‘kareshi’

Bonus word that didn’t appear in the episode:

インスタ映え；いんすたばえ；being instagrammable; looking good on Instagram​

Since it would be romanized as Insta-bae, it always made me think of ‘bae’.

reblog.comment:

title: The Wedding Part 2: The Preparations
body:
*at the venue of the wedding, Retsuko, Tsunoda, and Fenneko are browsing the area, discussing the details of how the event should go*

Tsunoda: Hmm. So, I’m wondering if we should go with eggshell white, or pearl white, for the table clothing. What do you think?

Retsuko: ….here I was, thinking the white was for the dress. :T

Tsunoda: We’ll get to that, soon enough! For now, I’m focused on the culinary.

Retsuko: I mean, I guess it doesn’t matter. A cake, some meat, a salad, that’s all you really need, right?

Tsunoda: *GAAASP!* Retsuko! For SHAME! This is your wedding! Your own celebration of love! And your response to such a thing as important as food is, “it doesn’t matter”?!

Retsuko: …um…yeah?

Fenneko: Tsunoda, it’s a wedding. Not a damn religious ceremony…..well, actually, it is, in some cultures, but that’s besides the point. It’s her wedding, let her do it how she wants to do it.

Tsunoda: Um, well, if she wants to have the most underwhelming wedding in existence, that’s her choice. But my job is to add some umph to this drab disaster area.

Fenneko: A disaster area I paid for, because I thought it would be good.

Tsunoda: I hope you kept the reciept!

Fenneko: Ugh. The point is, she’s the one getting married, she, of the three of us, should have the most say in what goes on here.

Tsunoda: I agree! I just hope that she knows what she’s doing here!

Retsuko: Well, frankly, you’re not helping with your egging on!

Tsunoda: I’m just saying! If you want the perfect wedding, you need to have a vision behind it!

Retsuko: Okay, here’s my vision! “Haida and I get married, our friends and family are there, people eat food, and have fun, a little dance or two, the end.” That’s it! Nothing else!

Fenneko: Exactly. You don’t need intricate details to the venue, to make something like this beautiful. The mere thought of marrying someone you love should be enough.

Retsuko: For certain! And even if I didn’t take that into account, I just wanted a wedding that didn’t really break the bank!

Tsunoda: Well, that’s a tall order! You either go broke, or go for a shitty wedding.

Retsuko: Give me shitty, then! I don’t care!

Tsunoda: Hmph! That’s a big mistake, I will let you know! *walks away*

Retsuko: Ugh…you know, I knew this would be a big deal, I didn’t think it would be THAT big.

Fenneko: It isn’t. People just make it that way. For the life of me, I will never understand people who absolutely have to go above and beyond for a wedding. I get a little effort, you don’t want a complete shitshow. But…millions of yen? Traveling to other parts of the globe? All in the service of ONE day, where you guys get married? Which could end with a divorce anyways? Like, what’s the point of going to those measures? I get honeymoons, but weddings? Nah, man, keep it simple.

Retsuko: …

Fenneko: …sorry, just had to get that out.

Retsuko: It’s fine…I’m just gonna be happy when that day finally comes. Like, I don’t care about anything else at the moment, just getting to that day, getting wed….*sigh* it’s gonna be great, I can feel it. ^^

Fenneko: That’s the spirit. :3 When are your folks supposed to be coming to town?

Retsuko: Later this afternoon.

Fenneko: Excellent. Right on schedule. We should probably grab some grub for everyone to have tonight, and then head down to the station.

Retsuko: Very well!

summary: So I've watched a Netflix series called Aggretsuko and I've got to say that I absolutely adore this show. They even confirmed...
caption:
So I’ve watched a Netflix series called Aggretsuko and I’ve got to say that I absolutely adore this show. They even confirmed they are having a Season 2 coming soon! I don’t know when they’ll release it, but I really want to see it now!! ><

Anyway, the show is about this little Red Panda character named Retsuko who works in an office and… is kind of a doormat in the office food chain. Whenever she get’s mad or frustrated, she belts out Death Metal! Let’s face it, we’ve all been in her shoes where we feel the urge to just scream.

I’ve watched this show twice now and thanks to @askj-221rickandfriends I finally caved and drew an Aggretsuko OC.

Meet Anette the Maine Coon Cat. She’s was a new hire in the accounting department, but in a short amount of weeks she became the accounting star. Her numbers were carefully calculated, she could carry tons of paper to her desk without a sweat, and she would help others who have trouble. Of course, just because she was an office star, doesn’t mean she likes everyone, in fact, she hates Mr. Ton and Ms. Tsubone for their misconduct. Because of this, she’s striving to destroy the food chain and take charge with her skills and prove a point to both of them.

Outside of work, Anette goes to the gym run by an alligator who she affectionately calls “Scales” (I don’t have a name for him yet, but I’m hoping to get one soon). When she’s at the gym, she’s either running, boxing, or wrestling with either random participants or with “Scales” himself. The two don’t mind at all since they’ve been friends since they’ve been kids, but over time Anette realized she’s been crushing on “Scales”… hard. Of course, with her job, she finds that chasing feelings for “Scales” will likely slow her down. When she feels ready, maybe… just maybe they can be an item.

blog.description: Name's Wilfre, Your local Pepsiman. An Mage of Life. I draw OCs, and Homestuck mostly. If someone draws a Limeblood Kurloz I shall instantly befriend them. Requests are open. Icon by @lime-time
